definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 15:b. [[אֵיד]]: Bev:Jphil. xxvi. 302 der. from Ar.  be strong [also appress, burden], whence  (or ) calamity.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — [[אֵד]]: Ar. derivation very dub.; D1:W125, cf. WB22 KS:2.4 Hpt:JA0S 1896, 158 ff. Gunk:Ge 2:6 Holz:Ge 2:6 Buhl cp. As. edû, flood, mass of waters (√ [[אדה]]), editu, overflow (for irrigation); LXX SyrVer Vulgate Aq in Ge 2:6 have spring, Targum cloud, so LXX Targum Job 36:27; add perh. Job 36:30 [[אֵדוֹ]] for [[אוֹרוֹ]] (Du Dr).
